data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Al Jazirah, Sudan.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Jazirah, Sudan

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Al Jazirah, Sudan to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Al Jazirah, Sudan.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Al Jazirah, Sudan need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Kababish people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Kababish people know you.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Al Jazirah who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Al Jazirah.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Jazirah, Sudan has a population of 2,796,300.

We estimate Al Jazirah has 10,823 people who might know Jesus, 128,578 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,656,899 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 258 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 2,656,899, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

location.name: Al Jazirah
location.cities_list: Wad Medani, Al Manāqil, Al Hasaheisa, Kināna, Al Hilāliyya
location.cities_list_w_pop: Wad Medani (332,714), Al Manāqil (128,297), Al Hasaheisa (28,735), Kināna (26,233), Al Hilāliyya (17,345)
